document.full_text: left-wing nationalist ollanta humala added experienced technocrats to his campaign team on monday, trying to convince investors he would keep much of peru's market economy intact if elected president in june.
document.title: moderate technocrats align with peru's humala
lines_and_colors: left-wing nationalist ollanta humala added experienced technocrats to his campaign team on monday, trying to convince investors he would keep much of peru's market economy intact if elected president in june.
